special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Vastwood enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this Expedition reaches stage 2, draw a card for each creature you control with a counter on it.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
